name: Matchville
description:
Matchville is a beautiful town where everyone can find a job that suits them. Complete three-in-a-row levels to advance the plot, make new friends and decorate picturesque locations. Your own cafe is already waiting for you!In store for you:
  • exciting Three-in-a-row Levels
  • grow Your Own Cafe and Its Surroundings
  • A multitude of items that you can customize to your taste
  • Meet friendly and fun characters

Become part of life in Matchville and discover the story of the town alongside Max, Alice and its other residents. After all, true friendship forms where people love what they're doing. And maybe true love too.
